programme.desc: The new club members must take turns introducing one another, causing Hana to wonder what her strengths are.

programme.desc: A spontaneous question causes Hana to freeze during her first broadcast; it's one thing to stick to the script; improvising is a completely different story.

programme.desc: Anne is realistic, while Hanna is idealistic; disagreements are inevitable; that won't stop Hanna from trying to befriend her fellow club member.

programme.desc: It's a tight deadline, but the broadcasting club has the will to complete their submission to the original TV drama category.

programme.desc: The best way to improve one's skills; there are many answers, but no single best path.

programme.title: Farming Life in Another World
programme.desc: Now that they've secured a reliable water source, they can start a rice paddy and build a bathhouse.

programme.desc: With their homestead completed, they turn their focus to food preparation as winter is coming.

programme.desc: A surprise attack would have shattered their peaceful lives were it not for the almighty farming tool; as word spreads, their home blooms into a village.

programme.desc: News of the impending birth thrills the villagers, but they aren't the only ones interested.

programme.sub-title: Present for You; The Yellow Ribbon of Happiness
programme.desc: Sakura's crazy exorcism ritual does Ataru more harm than good; Ataru gets more than he bargained for when he uses power-dampening yellow ribbons on Lum.

programme.title: Urusei Yatsura
programme.sub-title: Trouble Rains Down!!; Amazed in a Maze
programme.desc: Shutaro becomes the apple of every girl's eye and, by extension, a prick to every boy; Lum, Ataru, Shinobu and Shutaro struggle to find a way out of a labyrinthine cave.

programme.title: Urusei Yatsura
programme.desc: Ataru and Shutaro emerge as potential mates for the crow aliens' very own sleeping beauty. While one steals the customary kiss, the other captures her heart simply by being in the right place at the right time.

programme.title: Urusei Yatsura
programme.sub-title: The Glove of Love and Conflict; How I've Waited for You...
programme.desc: A cursed boxing glove sends Ataru on a hugging spree and gets him into trouble; Ataru is dancing on air after reading a love letter from a secret admirer.

programme.title: Urusei Yatsura
programme.sub-title: Good Day for a Departure; Oyuki; Ataru Retires
programme.desc: Playing for the Oni aliens, Ataru sets his flirtatious sights on Benten from the rival team; Ataru has a snowy encounter with Lum's Neptune-based friend, Oyuki; Ataru's vague announcement sparks wild speculations.

programme.title: Urusei Yatsura
programme.sub-title: Home Is Where You Find It; Marine Garbage Disposal
programme.desc: All Ataru wants is Sakura in his arms, but all he gets is a lonely monster holding his hands underwater; an unexpected new beginning awaits the lonely monster at the beach.
